snippet.title: Indie Impressions - Watch Dogs
snippet.description:
Excited for the new sandbox/action game by the same name but feeling kinda down that it got delayed? Well, I'm here with something probably far better anyway. Watch Dogs by developer CNIAngel is a game that delivers on its promise of being able to watch dogs very successfully. Over the course of this video we'll experience a variety of dogs the likes of which the world has never seen. In true Katamari cousin fashion, these dogs are wild and free and don't play by anyone's rules except their own. Try Watch Dogs for free at the links below!

Official Dev Site: http://cniangel.net/games.html
Play Online: http://gamejolt.com/games/strategy-sim/w-tch-dogs/17283/
Download: http://gamejolt.com/games/w-tch-dogs/download-distribution/17881/?os=windows

Any support for the show you feel I deserve - including "likes", comments and favorites - are a huge help to raise awareness of what I'm doing and the indie games I cover. For more check out the links below:

- The official show site: http://indie-impressions.com

- Catch me live at: http://www.twitch.tv/rockleesmile

- Follow me on Twitter: @RockLeeSmile and @Indieimpression

- 'Like' my Indie Impressions Facebook page and keep updated on what's going on every day! 
https://www.facebook.com/IndieImpressions

- Official Indie Impressions Greenlight Collection:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96254946

Got a game suggestion for me? Let me know! New ideas are always welcome. Indie Devs: I will also try to schedule a video upload with you for your game launch if you'd like a little help getting the word out!
